reviews.comments: Hermosa casa con vista a la montaña tal cual cómo en las fotos, Muy recomendable!!
Mejor, imposible. Hermosa casa! Más linda que en las fotos. Laura muy atenta. Volveremos!
La casa es un sueño. Lejos del ruido. El paisaje hermoso. Nos resultó todo muy confortable.

La casa es hermosa, espaciosa y cómoda. Esta super bien equipada hasta el último detalle con todo lo que uno puede llegar a necesitar para sentirse cómo en casa. Laura es super amable y está a disposición. Nos sentimos super bienvenidos. Una experiencia sin duda para repetir!

Muy linda la casa, bien ubicada cerca de las bodegas.
Es un lugar unico y recomendable.
Saludos
La casa es como se ve en fotos o mejor ! Muy cómoda y tranquila .  La ubicación excelente , todo más que positivo . Vamos a volver sin duda !!!
Excelente lugar, Laura y Alex son excelentes anfitriones, la gata es lo mas y vamos a volver la proxima vez que estemos en Mendoza

Alex fue súper amable desde el inicio. Previo a nuestro viaje ya nos contacto para brindarme información, y siempre atento a nuestras necesidades. El día de nuestro check in, terminamos llegado a las 10pm por qué veníamos desde Chile en auto, y no tuvo problema en esperarnos en la casa, donde nos recibió muy amablemente y nos explicó todo lo que teníamos que saber. Nos dio información sobre donde podíamos ir a cenar, bodegas que nos recomendaba visitar, etc. durante toda nuestra estadía, estuvo presenta para cuando lo necesitábamos. 
La casa 10 puntos, súper cómoda, acogedora, y con la mejor compañía de Azuca, la gata "dueña" de la casa. 
La experiencia fue genial, casi inmejorable; y digo casi porque nos tocaron 2 días de lluvia, pero que igual le encontramos su encanto a la casa con lluvia. 
Superó nuestras expectativas y definitivamente volveríamos.

fue la primera vez que use los servicios de la pagina y la verdad que mejor experiencia imposible. Alex ( el anfitrión ) y su hermana Laura muy amables y predispuestos! 100% recomendable. ademas que la casa es tal cual figura en el anuncio. muchas gracias Ale por todo!!
Pasamos una semana muy linda. Hermosa la casa y cumplió con nuestras expectativas.

Excelente atención por parte de Alex y Laura, nos hicieron sentir como en casa. La casa en sí tiene vistas excepcionales y propaga un ambiente de tranquilidad. Si lo que estás buscando es estar en un lugar calmo y hermoso esta casa es perfecta! La locación es ideal ya que hay numerosos viñedos para visitar!!! Excelente experiencia que esperamos poder repetir.
el barrio muy seguro y tranquilo. pasamos un dias increíbles , la casa es bellisima ,comoda y la vista que tiene a la montaña hermosa. un lugar 100% recomendable para ir y desconectar de todo.

La casa es hermosa, y si cocinan, es el lugar ideal, para cocinar y tomar vino y disfrutar de la hermosa vista que tiene la casa. Casi ni salimos de la casa más que para ir a comprar víveres. Alex y su hermana Laura unos genios. El cuarto es increíble. Super cálido. Volveríamos sin dudas, siempre que vengamos a Mendoza.

Ha sido un gran lujo y suerte de encontrar la casa de alejendro, la cual nos perimite un viaje más unico e inolvidadble de ruta de vino en mendoza. La casa tiene una visita única y desiño genial que es lo más única. aparte, Alejandro es un gran experto en gastronomía y turismo. Nos ayuda a hacer plan de ruta de vino y nos hace llegar a lugares más impresionantes como valle de eco. Alejandro es una persona con mucha detalle y nos cuida mucho durante todo el viaje. Totalmente casa de cinco estrellas.此次门多萨之行因为遇到ale而完美,设计师风格的房子,完美的细节,便利的安排,下次再回门多萨还是愿去石头房子。

Excelente experiencia para relajarse y disfrutar la Mendoza del vino.
La casa y el servicio (URL HIDDEN) atención de Laura y su dedicación la llevó a otro nivel. 
Excellent experience let your self go and let Laura take care of your needs. We met a host but we left a friend. Go for it.
La casa es muy hermosa así como las fotos. Laura es muchisimo amable y muy atenciosa. Pasamos días lindos. Todo perfecto!

Desde que me comuniqué con Alex expresando mi interés en su casa siempre respondió enseguida y contestó a todas mis preguntas. Además me informó sobre las distancias entre su casa y la ciudad de Mendoza y me sugirió sitios y medios de transportación. Desde que ví las fotos de la casa me enamoré del lugar. Es para amantes de la naturaleza y el campo ya que está en un monte de olivos, en las afueras de Luján del Cuyo. La casa es hermosa, con un diseño y decorado entre moderno y rústico. Alex nos recibió con mucha amabilidad y su hermana Laura nos ayudó desde irnos a buscar a la terminal de ómnibus, hasta hacernos las reservas a bodegas. También sugerencias donde abastecernos y sitios para conocer. Muy amables y simpáticos los dos. La gatita Azuca es divina y no molesta para nada. Solo hay que darle de comer y entrarla en las noches. Para los que se preocupan por la seguridad, la casa está en un lugar aislado pero en un barrio privado con entrada con garita. Las vistas de los Andes son espectaculares. La casa posee todas las comodidades y la cocina está equipada con todo. Definitavemente un lugar para regresar!

La casa está hermosa, y el anfitrión siempre estuvo muy atento, nos proporcionó mucha información de cosas que hacer en los alrededores, y siempre estuvo dispuesto a ayudar. Lo recomiendo ampliamente y sin duda volveré en cuanto tenga la oportunidad!
We were happy with our stay in n this very cool house!

Gillar man väldesignat, lugnt ,säkert läge är detta perfekt!
Och att få så bra vägledning och tips av Laura var ovärdeligt!
Att bo mitt i ett av världens bästa vinområden är så nära en eventuell himmel
man kan komma! Plus all gourmetmat!,
Om det inte vore så långt från Sweden skulle vi återkomma snart.
Une maison très fonctionnelle pour un couple! Bien située et dans un Barrio, donc sécuritaire! Près de la ville  en voiture! Paisible et relaxant!

Cannot say enough about how much we enjoyed this experience.  The home was perfect for the three of us!!!  (Myself, my bride and house cat Azuca!!!)  The home was stylish, efficient, immaculate and had all of the amenities we needed. And now for the best part....Laura.  From her tremendous communication to her uncompromising hospitality to her concierge type service creating all of our reservations at Bodegas and restaurants.....SHE WAS FANTASTIC!!!  Unequaled Airbnb service.  Kudos!!!!!!
Laura is what makes this place special. She will take care of everything for you. From the airport pick up to the drop off! Thanks for the Company and the tours! From the crazy fun loving gals!

This is the perfect house for a relaxing, indulgent trip to Mendoza! We loved staying at the house, watching the vista whilst sharing a home cooked meal and local wine. Laura gave us recommendations for wineries to visit for tastings or lunch, they were absolutely perfect- highly recommend following her advice! 
Watching the Andes in the morning when you can see them so clearly or on the rooftop when the sun sets is delightful. An uninterrupted view not to be missed. Staying close drive to many restaurants, wineries and shops will have you comfortable for your whole trip.
Gracias for having us!!

We’ve had a very warm welcome by our host Laura. We enjoyed our stay! The house is wonderful with selected interior, a large garden and a vast view of the mountains. It is a great location to relax and visit the bodegas; Laura is very helpful and can arrange all the visits. Muchas gracias for making this a unique experience.

Alex's house is as beautiful in reality as it looks on Airbnb but the setting is even more spectacular, the views of the Andes are incredible. If you are looking for somewhere spectacular and comfortable to relax you cannot do better. There are some lovely vineyards close by and the small town is a short drive away for any needs. Alex's lovely cat Azuca is so sweet too we were very sad to say goodbye to her.

However while this is all fantastic the best thing was the care and support from Laura, Alex's sister. She arranged everything for us, hired us a car and took us on a couple of fantastic tours. On other days she made reservations and gave us fabulous tips. She really made our holiday and we also felt very sad to say goodbye to her. Nothing was too much trouble, it was an amazing experience. Thank you Alex & Laura
We loved every detail of the house. It was made to make people absolutely comfortable and the atmosphere of the place is amazing. :)

Simply the best place we have ever been in the world. The house has such a good energy, stunning view, surrounded by olive trees and located in the heart of the winery region.
You are literally 10 minutes from a plenty of bodegas. 
Alex build a house full of wonderful meaning. Every stone of the house was brought by him and his sister, Laura, from the Andes. Each part of the house makes you feel in contact with nature, but inside the comfort of a well equipped place (with heating and a/c, hot shower, amazing bed, fantastic kitchen).
Laura was more than a host. She saved our trip when we had troubles with a strike at Buenos Aires airport. Always available, kind and ready to help us. There are no words that can describe how grateful we are. . If you are looking for a rustic modern place to relax and experience Mendoza the most, this is the one.

The best Airbnb experience ever! We loved Alex's house - it was just as beautiful as the pictures - and his sister, Laura (who manages it for him), created the perfect weekend for us. For a very reasonable price, Laura planned our entire stay, making all our reservations at wineries and restaurants and driving us everywhere (she even picked up/dropped off at the airport). Having a local do all this planning was a huge help, and we got to see places I'm sure we wouldn't have found on our own. Plus, Laura could not have been more lovely and welcoming, and we really enjoyed her company. Bonus- the resident kitty is as sweet as can be and made our time at the house even more fun.

If you're heading to the Mendoza area, I can't recommend this house and Laura's extra services enough!

Beautiful unique house well positioned to explore Mendoza. Attentive and helpful host, Laura (Alex's sister) arranged car, wineries, and lunches for us. Outrageously cute cat on premise was a treat for us! Note no wifi at the time writing, not an issue for us, but make sure data access is sorted and/or maps downloaded beforehand. Would highly recommend this accommodation to anyone!

Uma casa incrível , decoração única e uma vista de tirar o fôlego !!!
 
Indico de olhos fechados , obrigado pela maravilhosa experiência !!

Gracias Alex e Laura! Casa simplesmente incrível, com uma vista espetacular!
A gata Azuca nos acolheu como seus tutores... uma experiência única e exclusiva. 
Laura nos recebeu com vinho, flores e chocolate! A melhor anfitriã: super pontual, simpática e cuidadosa, nos surpreendia a cada escolha (bodegas e restaurantes). Fomos muito bem recebidos e a casa é muito acolhedora! Gracias Laura! Até breve...!

This house was so beautiful ! It is next to vineyards , with fresh country air . There is a beautiful terrace where you get a mountain /sunset /sunrise view. I loved it here . Laura was an amazing host , so kind and helpful!! Would definitely come back in my next stay in Mendoza :)

Alex e Laura, foi singular e mágico nossa hospedagem, sua casa é simplesmente incrível, uma energia inexplicável.....uma vista maravilhosa......, inesquecível....
Laura, seremos eternamente grato pelo seu carinho e atenção, seus passeios, jantares.... vão além de uma experiência turística e gastronômica......um mundo lúdico....

Hola Laura e Alex!
Gostamos muito de ficar hospedados na casa durante uma semana. A experiência foi fantástica. A vista da casa é extremamente linda, pena que pegamos alguns dias de chuva, e então não era todo dia que era possível avistar a cordilheira.
O silêncio e sussego da casa era o que precisávamos para descansar, além de ficar em um condomínio fechado com portaria e segurança 24 horas por dia.

A cozinha é bem equipada, e assim como Alex adora cozinhar, nós também gostamos de cozinhar tomando um bom vinho.
E vinho em Mendoza é o que não falta!!!!
Fizemos isso várias noites. Só não fizemos todas as noites, pois fomos umas 2 noites a Mendoza para conhecer a cidade.
A Azuca (gato) é uma belezinha, não atrapalhou em nada a nossa rotina, e adora dar uma fugidinha para o quintal.

Só uma coisinha...
Achamos que seria útil instalar wi-fi na casa. Facilitaria para nós, estrangeiros, a ter acesso à internet.

Laura nos ajudou muito nos levando ao supermercado, deixando mapas e até nos ajudou a comprar um número de celular argentino, o que ajudou a usar o GPS, além de pequisar mais algumas coisas na internet.

Laura também nos ajudou muito ao reservar as bodegas para visitarmos, além de sempre estar a disposição. E também alugou seu próprio carro para nós, sendo mais em conta que as locadoras do aeroporto.


Muito Obrigado por tudo, e Gostaríamos de poder voltar um dia!!!!
A great house in a nice location. Laura was fantastic to deal with and was incredibly helpful with any queries we had leading up to and during our stay.

This was the BEST decision of my trip to Argentina.  You MUST stay here!  This rustic house was in the most perfect and beautiful location.  It was peaceful and calm and had gorgeous views.  It was comfortable and it provided everything I needed or could want from a trip.  You want to stay here! I wanted to come to Mendoza to relax and visit some wineries and enjoy the beautiful countryside next to the Andes mountains, and this house was the PERFECT spot to do just that. 

 I also really recommend you let the owners of the home organize your trip.  Laura, is incredible!  She planned our whole stay.  I didn't have to think or plan a thing.  She made all of the reservations and drove us around to the wineries and gave us tours of all of the best spots in the region for a VERY reasonable price.  If you stay here you should have her plan your visit.   If your anything like me, I often don't have time to do the research before my vacation.  Laura did all of that for me and I could not have organized a better experience.   It was exactly what I needed/ wanted my stay in Mendoza to be.  It was perfect and incredible.  

I recommend this stay and Laura's tour services to everyone.

We were very happy with our boutique accommodation.  I know very well what a hosting is and Laura did an excellent job.   Laura let three of us stay in her house,  although the house is listed for 2 people.  A bed room was very comfortable with a nice view and beautiful bathroom.  The flow of the water in a shower was nice, water was hot.  I loved to cook our meals there, there are a lot of fresh spices at a window and a lot of dry spices.  Laura answered to my letters right away.  I could ask her any questions and an answer was here in a minute.  We asked Laura to drive us to Uco valley one day and got not only driving, but a lot of information about Argentinian life. 
When we arrived after a long way from JFK to Santiago and to Mendoza, there was a bottle of champagne in ice waiting for us.  I got a very special experience at Laura's place, I hope I come back or Laura visits us in PA, USA.
This house is absolutely amazing! Definitely stay here the next time you're in Mendoza! The house is perfect, excellent kitchen, and unbelievable views of the mountains. We will be back!

What a wonderful place!! This house is located in a safe gated community. This is a countryside rustic house that seems to be at the end of the road which makes it very private. The views of the Andes full of snow are breathtaking. We enjoyed it watching the marvelous sunset over a bottle of wine. It was clean and equipped with everything that you might need, even for cooking and outdoor BBQ. Azuca the cat was a great companion during our stay. The cat is very friendly and independent. I have to say that Laura, Alex sister was THE best host we have ever had. She welcome us with chocolates and a bottle of wine! :-) .I have to say that the house comes with personal concierge services as Laura assisted us in pretty much everything! She picked us up at the airport, helped with the car rental and made restaurants reservations (even for Santiago Chile which we were going after Argentina!). She is very well familiarize with the wineries so she recommended and helped us with the wineries reservations based on what we wanted to see. We highly recommend this house if you wish to experience the Mendoza countryside along with the wineries experience.

Fantastic house in gated area, perfect for a romantic hideaway, located 20 min from the city of Mendoza and 10 min from Lujan de Cuyo and Chacras de Coria where you will find nice little restaurants and shops for your daily needs. Perfect spot for vine tastings,  trekking and simply life enjoying. Make sure to detox at the hammam spa of Hotel Entre Cielos next door!

Nice house with designer touches, although showing significant signs of decay that have to be managed (some loose tiles, kitchen tap, rusty metal, light switches etc). 
The location has beautiful views on the Andes mountains, and a big garden with BBQ facilities. There is a sometimes busy road just behind the property which may be annoying sometimes. Very friendly and helpful host, with lots of good suggestions on things to do.
reviews.response:
Dear Pepijn,
First of all I appreciate your remarks on those details, that help us to improve more and more. But I would like to comment in a few things. We love to receive people and run this Airbnb mostly to give travellers the experience of being in our house that we built with effort and love.I am deeply sorry that you didn't call me during your stay to tell me about the loose light switch in the stairs and that the tap went loose in the kitchen, I would had go with our maintenance person to fix it in a moment, as well as glue the 4 tiles in the shower. That is why we have this person available for us all day any time. Maybe you felt like you didn't want to bother me but as I told you and always remark our guests is that it is very important for us to be available 24/7. It was a shame. The house is almost brand new and it is exactly as you can see it in the add photos. Being a house, there will always be things to fix and maintain due to the constant use but I went shocked and really sad when I read that in your opinion the house shows significant signs of decay. You are absolutely right about the things you mention that we should fix, thank you for that, I already fixed them, were things really fast to fix. The rusty metals that you mention as a sign of decay are part of the architectural design of the house witch is made by rusty looking metal, stones, glass and wood trying to blend it with the original landscape. Thank you for consider us friendly and helpful hosts, again it was a shame you did not call me to fix those things. I will remark even more in the future that I am here to help and fix anything that may not work in the house and for anything in general. Thank you one more time for the observations that help us to have the house in the the best condition as possible all the time.

Sincerely ,

Laura and Alex

reviews.comments: We had a lovely time in Mendoza. If you are looking for peace and quiet with spectacular views of the Andes this place is for you. Be aware that as described on the listing, this comes with being some distance away from shops, restaurants etc but that's also its charm. We developed an itinerary with Laura with a number of day trips in and out of the valley so you definitely are not "stuck". It also comes with a very affectionate cat! Highly recommended.

We were sold on this house when we saw the photos but it’s even better in person! The house is so well designed and styled you’ll wish you could live there. You can see views of the mountains and landscape from every room with the floor to ceiling sliding doors that open up completely.  We loved watching the sunrise and sunset from the rooftop that you can walk out on from the bedroom. The kitchen is stocked with all the tools and utensils you’d need for cooking, we actually used it a lot.  The bathrooms and shower are also clean and really, really nice, with warm water and plenty of space to put your toiletries.  Again, the views are amazing and it’s in a quiet neighborhood so the only sounds you hear are the birds outside.  We cannot say enough how amazing this house is.
 
On top of the house being wonderful, the hosts Laura and Alex are extremely accommodating. We did not expect them to help us so much but Laura was in contact with us well before our trip to help plan out our stay. If you’d like, she will plan out your days with reservations and bookings to wineries and activities. If you prefer to do it all yourself, she leaves you with an extended list of recommendations to her favorite wineries and restaurants in the area. (We tried out most of them and they were all really great!) Laura was so responsive and quick to reply whenever we had any questions about the house or area and she made all of the winery reservations for us.  We also rented a car from them, which was really great to get back and forth and explore the area. (You can also choose to have her drive you around if you’d like!)
 
We LOVED the location of the house and the Lujan de Cuyo area. The house is close to many local wineries and the roads were very easy to navigate and find our way around. We HIGHLY recommend staying here for the amazing house, the wonderful location, and amazing hosts that really make your stay smooth and comfortable.

Alex's house is the most beautiful get away home surrounded by 100's of vineyards, and they put in so much effort to make sure you have a full Mendoza experience. Couldn't have been happier with our stay!

This was hands down, the best Airbnb experience I've ever had. My boyfriend and I spent a few days in Mendoza and this Airbnb could not have been more perfect. It's BEAUTIFUL and fully equipped (best kitchen ever!) and the fact that Alex and Laura are so nice and accommodating made it all the more special. Laura picked us up from the airport, arranged car rental and the most amazing day of wine tasting! She is super easy/quick to communicate with. If you are passing through Mendoza, need not look further. This is a dream house with the most amazing hosts. They go out of their way to make you feel welcome and comfortable and it's so nice to connect with people who enjoy the same passion for travel. This is a must! Can't wait to visit again, we are still dreaming about the house. Definitely one of the highlights of our time in South America.

Everything was top! Alex has done everything, to make our stay in the best way - thank you for that.
A really nice place with a wonderful mountainview.

There aren't even words to describe how wonderful Alex's house is. Both he and Laura coordinated with us well beforehand to make sure that our visit to Mendoza was exactly what we wanted. Laura is incredibly hospitable and graciously helped us get around during our stay. The house is absolutely gorgeous - even better than the photos - and the views are incredible! Already thinking on when we can come back.

This house is awesome! It has plenty of space, is so unique, comfortable, has incredible views, and in a gated safe and secure neighborhood. The house is so well lit with natural light and upstairs bedroom is incredible for getting a good nights sleep after a day of visiting wineries. Kitchen is great for cooking at home. Best Airbnb we have ever stayed in!

Both Alex and Laura were so helpful. We left Mendoza with some life long friends. Laura helped us every bit of the way. Whether it was reservations, advice on where to go, help with getting groceries, transportation...you name it she was there for us. Wouldn't have been the same trip with out her. Both Alex and Laura are so kind. We LOVED Azuca (the cat). She's so cute, independent, and loveable. She made leaving our beloved dog at home manageable.

I wouldn't even look for other places to stay next time we go to Mendoza. There's no reason. Laura and Alex put their heart into this place and you can feel it.

Gratitude, gratitude, gratitude! Thanks for the memories Laura and Alex...we will be back!

Fantastic home.  We truly enjoyed escaping and enjoying this well appointed home.  Perfect view.  The home was perfect for us .  Alex and Laura were very accommodating and helpful.  Will definitely stay there again.

Alex's home provided a great location for my wife and I to explore Mendoza's growing wine country.  The views of the Andes are beautiful. The house is spacious and comfortable and the surrounding yard and seating area make for a great place to relax.  Thanks for a great stay!

Alex's house is one of the most incredible places we have ever stayed! It is so unique, beautiful modern architecture situated at the base of the Andes with incredible views. We couldn't recommend it enough! Laura was amazing booking our tours and helping with restaurant reservations. Thanks again Alex and Laura!

We had a comfortable stay in Alex's modern and unique home. The house is not located in a township but is ideally located for touring the wineries and exploring the beautiful countryside around Mendoza. We loved the view of the snow capped Andes from the house, the fresh herbs growing in the kitchen and we especially loved the gorgeous resident cat! The house has one bedroom but is very spacious and the combustion stove was lovely on the cooler evenings. There is a fantastic outdoor table situated  under an olive tree which would have been perfect for breakfast outside or an afternoon glass of wine but unfortunately the weather was too cold while we were there. Alex was away during our stay but his lovely sister Laura was extremely attentive and helpful and gave us excellent recommendations about wineries, restaurants and towns to visit. You will need a car if you are staying in this property but it's easy to organise a car in Mendoza or Laura can assist you. Some new bed linen, pillows and a comfortable couch downstairs would improve this excellent and comfortable house. We only wish we could have stayed longer! We hope to come back again one day and enjoy a week in the sun and Alex's place!

The house is amazing!! However, it is located about 35 minutes away from Mendoza. We definitely recommend this accommodation if you know how Argentina works. If you are going there for the wine experience make sure to have either a car or a wine tour lined up. If you dont have a car the remis/taxi rate to Mendoza is $300 pesos one way. 

The closest "town" is Chacras de Coria.. Keep in mind they have siesta and you won't find anything open between 1 pm and 4 pm including restaurants.. So definitely not a place to go for lunch or get a taxi from.

There is a winery across the road from the neighborhood main entrance (which is about 700 mts from the house).  the next closest winery is about 3kms away from the main entrance. 

It is a beautiful place to forget about the world. If you want internet make sure you have your own sim card.

Alex, Maira and Laura are really helpful and tried to help us as much as they could.

The cat was easy to look after. The only thing we didn't like was that the cat kept jumping on the kitchen bench, table and stove top. When we were eating she kept trying to eat our food from our plates or hands.
reviews.response:
Dear Margarita,

I appreciate your remarks. 

If I may, I would like to point a few things that you mention that I am sure were a result of a miss information and I would like to take this oportunity to put them clear.

The house is located in Vistalba wich belongs to Luján de Cuyo. It is a map in the profile with the exact location and distances. 

That is one of the most important wine regions of Mendoza, for that the house is surrounded by the best wineries. 

We have this village that you well mention called Chacras de Coria where you can find all kind of convenience stores, bakeries, fresh fruits and vegetables stores, farmacies, banks, restaurants, bars, cafes, small wineries, clothing stores, etc. 

An other good tip you share is about the siesta time. Everything opens from 9am to 1pm and from 4pm to 9pm. Not all of them, you can still find open places, I will inform about them from now on, thanks for that too. 

The restaurants do not have this brake. We have lots of restaurants in the village and they receive many tourist as well as local people, they have normal schedules and shifts. They are open from 11.30 am and the kitchens close after 12 in the evening.

There are plenty options available to have the whole wine experience as well of many other attractions that our province have to offer. I give any guidance to my guests in this regard as well as all options of transportation. 

Another good observation is about internet acces. What all the guests incluiding me do, is to buy at the airport an argentinian chip, wich is really cheap and with that you will have full internet access in the house that you can share with your computers. 

Every place in the village provides free wifi.

I am very sorry about this incident with Azuca, my kitten. As she is very independent and loves to be in the garden, what I do if she gets where she shouldn't while we are eating or cooking, I let her go out play in the garden. I should have tell you how to deal with that, I didn't imagine that would happen, my apologizes. 

Well, thanks again for your comments and I hope if you visit us again in the future, this information help you have a great time.

Greetings from Mendoza,

Alex

reviews.comments:
Fantastic home and even better host in Laura. 

The home is secluded in the back of a development. You have the entire landscape to yourself looking out the back window. The home overlooks the tallest mountain in the Andes and is breathtaking when clear weather cooperates. The house is modern with traditional Argentina touches. Very, very cool place to stay snd would recommend it to my friends/family. 

Laura was a phenomenal host and even served as a taxi for us when needed. She took us around town, showed us local spots and joined us for dinner. She was a major reason for the level of enjoyment we had while visiting. Great friend and highly recommend!

Esta casa é incrível! Super bem decorada, em um lugar lindo e bastante seguro! A casa é muito ampla, a cozinha é fantástica e a lareira é perfeita para aproveitar o frio de Mendoza! O quarto e o banheiro também são amplos, bem decorados e iluminados.
O bairro é excelente para quem pretende visitar as vinícolas da região, pois é perto das de Lujan de Cuyo, e metade do caminho para Valle do Uco.
Quem nos atendeu foi Laura, irmã de Alex, um amor de pessoa, fez o que pode para tornar nossa hospedagem a mais agradável possível! Ela nos buscou e levou no aeroporto de Mendoza (que fica a cerca de 40 minutos da casa), e acabamos alugando o carro dela, que foi super cômodo, pois o horário das locadoras de veículo em Mendoza é muito complicado para quem tem voos a noite ou no início da manhã.
Recomendo o local a todos!

Chegamos na data combinada e fomos pontualmente recebidos pela Laura que é a simpaticíssima e super atenciosa irmã do Alex.

A casa fica localizada em um condomínio fechado, com porteiros 24hrs, onde todas as pessoas que entram e saem devem ser identificadas, a casa é exatamente como mostram as fotos, a cozinha extremamente bem equipada, os banheiros limpos e amplos e o quarto pode ser descrito por ser um primor de pedras, concreto, vidro, tudo muito bem organizado e muito próximo das melhores vinícolas e "bodegas" de Mendoza. 

O local fica próximo de um centrinho que contem mercearia, açougue e verduraria, tudo muito organizado, limpo e com justos preços.

Nossa estadia foi marcada pela incrível vista que a casa oferece, sendo em especial a cordilheira dos Andes e o Monte Aconcágua.  Adegas como Nieto Senetiner, Luigi Bosca e Lagarde encontram-se entre 5 e 10 minutos de carro da casa, e adegas como El Enemigo, Pulenta State, Terrazas, Chandon e outra infinidade de otimas bodegas ficam em no maximo 25 minutos da casa.

Não se pode esquecer o grande jardim rodeado por oliveiras com uma mesa externa que nos convida ao churrasco (assado argentino) ali mesmo regado a muito vinho e servido com as melhores carnes compradas ali pertinho.

Ou seja, tudo foi incrível, a recepção, a organização, o local em si.

Nosso projeto foi alugar a casa para fugir de hotéis caros e ter a experiencia intima e confortável sem ter que dar satisfações ou ter contatos inconvenientes com outros hospedes, ou seja, tudo saiu exatamente como (URL HIDDEN) certeza voltaremos para mais uma semana em MARÇO para que possamos mais uma vez viver esse sonho Argentino.

Obrigado Alex e Laura por esse pequeno pedaço de paraíso na terra.

Anderson & Alaxssandra de Curitiba (Fazenda Rio Grande) - PR

Laura stood in for her brother during our stay, and made our trip to Mendoza unforgettable! She arranged to pick us up from the airport and helped us plan last-minute winery trips and restaurant reservations. Not only did she become our impromptu travel advisor, she offered us a great deal to drive us around town and was the best private driver we could have asked for! All the detours and little moments that we were afforded because of her attention and flexibility created a priceless experience. On top of all this, the house is beautiful with exquisite sunrise views over the mountains, and the house cat Azuca is an added bonus. Would definitely recommend.
A casa é muito aconchegante, e a Laura, irmã do Alex, nos recebeu com muito carinho e foi super atenciosa!

First of all, we'd like to thank Alex for understanding the problems we had with the flights (due to a strike in Argentinian airports) and letting us check in and out one day later. We've apreciated so much! Although Ale wasn´t there, he made himself very well represented by his sister Laura, who was so kind and helpfull (specially when we ran out of hot water). The house is incredible and the kitchen has everything you may need to prepare a great meal. The location is perfect, in a safe and private neighborhood, just a few minutes by car from great wineries and with an amazing view of the Andes. And to complete, there´s Azuca! A friendly and lovely cat.

Nossa estadia em Mendoza não poderia ser melhor!
Nos sentimos mesmo em casa! 
Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Laura, irmã do Alex, que nos deixou bem à vontade e se colocou à disposição para chamá-la a qualquer momento!
A casa é espetacular e a vista que ela nos dá dos Andes, encantadora!!
Fica num condomínio muito bonito e tranquilo e há muitas vinícolas a curta distância de lá!
Adoramos tb a cia da gata Azuca! Muito fofa!
Enfim, é uma excelente opção de estadia e, certamente, quando voltarmos a Mendoza, vamos querer ficar lá de novo!
Gracias, Alex y Laura!
Abraço, Paula e Alexandro

Laura a irmã do Alex nos recebeu muito bem, não tivemos nenhuma dificuldade em pegar as chaves. A Casa é totalmente fotogênica, bate com todas informações e descrições, estando com carro o acesso é muito fácil e está melhor localizada entre as bodegas, do que qualquer outra hospedagem em Mendoza, a vista é surpreendente, muito bem equipada. O bairro é tranquilo, um loteamento fechado com controle de acesso.

The house is amazing! It's a wonderful place to relax and enjoy the beauty of the region! It's well located In the area nearby the vyneards. It's also very safe since it's inside a private neighborhood. Our guest provided us all the info we need adittion lots of tips, during our entire stay in the house!!! We are already planning our next visit :)

Alex's house is a lovely place and the kitchen is superb!!(as seen on pictures) The house is located at a safe neighbourhood not too far away from the town and is a nice place to unwind oneself. Alex and her sister Laura helped me to arrange a winery tour and it was an amazing experience! I enjoyed my stay at Mendoza very much. I would definitely suggest his place for other:)
